body.head: Henry Expert (born Bordeau, May 12, 1863; died Tourrettes-sur-Loup, Aug 18, 1952)

div.p: Henry Expert (born Bordeau, May 12, 1863; died Tourrettes-sur-Loup, Aug 18, 1952), French musicologist, specialist in French music of the 15th and 16th centuries, editor of the monumental series Maîtres Musiciens de la Renaissance Française (1894-1908, 1924-29), and Florilège du Concert Vocal de la Renaissance (1928-29); also librarian of the Bibliothèque Ste Geneviève (1905-09) and the Paris Conservatory Library (1909-; senior librarian from 1920-33).
